summary: This adds the item \"Thu\'um Infinium\" to the game. This allows you to shout as many time as you want without a cooldown period. The item should automatically appear in your inventory once you installed the mod. I also added another copy on top of the dragonsreach enchanting table for the people who can\'t get it the other way.
descriptionHtml: This adds the item \"Thu\'um Infinium\" to the game. This allows you to shout as many time as you want without a cooldown period. The item should automatically appear in your inventory once you installed the mod. I also added another copy on top of the dragonsreach enchanting table for the people who can\'t get it the other way.
author: Imnop
